name: SF-07 Astral
description:
Description:

Command the spaceship known as SF07-Astral, the last of its kind, in a bid to save the galaxy from the impending doom of invasion by a colonial alien race.

Disclaimer: The artwork and music used in this game are sourced from Google and / or store bought assets. I do not own any of the artwork used in this game. This game is made purely for educational purposes.

Date: February, 2015

Duration: 1 week
__________

Controls:

R - Reset Game

W, A, S, D - Move

K - Normal Shoot

J - Energy Shield (0.1 Energy per frame)

I - Hyperbeam (50 Energy)

L - Nuclear Missiles (35 Energy)
